channel.title: ActivityPub in Godmother's House
channel.description:
Back in July I wrote a couple of introductory pieces about how ActivityPub works server-to-server.
* [Part 1: Overview](https://marnanel.dreamwidth.org/417305.html) * [Part 2: Authentication](https://marnanel.dreamwidth.org/417662.html)
I'd welcome suggested edits and ideas about what else the series should cover.
(The theme is based on Joyce Lankester Brisley's children's story [*Marigold in Godmother's House*](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/788236.Marigold_In_Godmother_s_House).)
